text: aur hamane ibaraaheem ko isahaaq va yaaqoob (sa beta pota) ata kiya hamane sabakee hidaayat kee aur unase pahale nooh ko (bhee) ham hee ne hidaayat kee aur unheen (ibaraaheem) ko aulaad se daood va sulemaan va ayyoob va yoosuph va moosa va haarun (sab kee hamane hidaayat kee) aur nekon kaaron ko ham aisa hee ilm ata pharamaate hain
